body.name: ExpertPower 12v 7ah Rechargeable Sealed Lead Acid Battery
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 10 mins
features: Genuine ExpertPower Battery - The Most Trusted And Highest Reviewed Sealed Lead Acid Batteries On Amazon
Battery Type - 12 Volt 7 Amp 20 Hour Sealed Lead Acid Battery With F1 Terminals
Ease Of Mind -All Of Our Batteries Are MAINTENANCE FREE and VALVE REGULATED
RUGGED CONSTRUCTION - The High Impact Resistant Battery Case Is Made Up Of A Non-Conductive ABS Plastic. This Material Has a Strong Resistance To Shock, Vibration, Chemicals and Heat.

AGM TECH - The Acid Inside Is Absorbed Between The Plates And Thereby Immobilized By A Very Fine Fiberglass Mat. This Along With The Valve Regulated, Spill-Proof Design Of Our Batteries Allows Trouble-Free, Safe Operation In Any Orientation
USER FRIENDLY - Easy, One-Time Installation Of Our Maintenance Free and Valve Regulated Batteries Will Get Your System Or Application Running In No Time At All
body.description: ExpertPower Sealed Lead Acid Batteries are made with the highest quality of materials available. Our Lead Acid Batteries are typically used for: Home Alarm Systems, Uninterruptible Power Supply(UPS), Lighting Equipment, General Electronics, Home Security Systems, Emergency Systems, Medical Devices, Electric Scooters, Solar Collectors, Wheelchairs and many Other Applications. Whether it's the SECURITY of your home, the MOBILITY of your machine, or even just a personal HOBBY, be sure to use the most efficient batteries available.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: There's nothing delicate about this guy, but don't be put off by his tough exterior. He'll be your best friend in no time. More important than the power you will receive from our batteries is the ease of mind you experience in knowing that our batteries are the most reliable in the business. External Durabliltiy Internal Qualilty Complete Reliability ExpertPower EXP1270 12 Volt 7 Amp Rechargeable SLA Battery The EXP1270 is a standard sized 12 volt battery commonly used in cable boxes and home alarm systems. The small size makes it convenient for many popular applications such as security systems and Uninterruptible-Power-Systems. Its external casing is made with a hardened ABS plastic to protect against spills and leaks. The battery utilizes Absorbent Glass Mat Technology which is capable of delivering high currents on demand and offers a relatively long service life. 12 Volt 7 Ah / 20 Hr SLA Battery Maintenance Free Long Shelf Life High Discharge Rate Long Service Life

From Our Factory to Your Front Door Step 1 - Assemble & Charge Ever wonder how a battery is made? Me neither, but it's actually quite interesting. The first component of the battery is the ABS plastic shell. We then insert our very own lead plates and glass mat separators into the shell before filling with acid. The batteries are then capped, sealed, and charged to complete the process. Step 2 - Assess for Quality The next step in the process is that of quality control. We don't make great products by accident. Our inventory is carefully controlled by strict quality assessments that must be met before qualifying for shipment. Our products undergo voltage tests, weight measurement, and psychology tests to make sure they are physically and mentally sound. Step 3 - Pack with Care We've all gotten that package delivered in the mail that was clearly marked as "fragile" but looked like it was used as a football by the delivery man. That's why all of our items are packaged with the customer in mind Step 4 - Deliver On Time, Every Time Your order is not completed until the item is in your hands. After all, what good is a great product if it doesn't get to you in time? When your alarm is screeching "Fix Me, Fix Me!", you can trust that you won't have to wait an eternity for your battery to arrive.

The Expert Staff - Saving the world one battery at a time The Experts are a group of multi-talented battery specialists who spent way too much time indoors while growing up. They're real people who genuinely care about providing you with the best service possible. With Great Power Comes Great Rechargeability Established in 1987, we've been in the battery business for over 20 years. Our product reviews are from actual customers who both appreciate and trust the quality they have come to expect from our products. We're not the bragging type, but we're more than happy to let our customers speak for us. Feeling Powerless? Are you trying to power your alarm or power your boat? Doesn't matter, because we're here to power your life. With our wide variety of products, you can always be sure that we have the item you need. Want to talk about it? If you have a question, comment, complaint about any of our products or services, please send us a message, and we'll get back to you within 1 business day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Power Source for Various Applications
reviews.reviewText: The ExpertPower 12V 7Ah Rechargeable Sealed Lead Acid Battery has proven to be a reliable and versatile power source for various applications. Whether it's for emergency backup, outdoor activities, or DIY projects, this battery delivers consistent and dependable performance.One of the standout features of this battery is its 12V 7Ah capacity, providing sufficient power for a wide range of devices and equipment.The sealed lead-acid technology ensures leak-free operation and enhanced safety, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.I appreciate the rechargeable design, as it allows me to reuse the battery multiple times, saving money on disposable batteries.The compact and lightweight design makes the battery easy to transport and install, ideal for portable devices and applications.The durable construction of the ExpertPower battery ensures its longevity and ability to withstand various environmental conditions.I love how this battery serves as a dependable backup power source during power outages, providing peace of mind and continuity during critical moments.The versatility of the ExpertPower 12V 7Ah battery allows me to use it for various purposes, such as powering small electronics, lighting systems, and more.The brand's commitment to product quality and customer satisfaction is evident in the battery's outstanding performance.In conclusion, the ExpertPower 12V 7Ah Rechargeable Sealed Lead Acid Battery is a top-notch choice for anyone in need of a reliable and versatile power solution. With its ample capacity, rechargeable design, and durable construction, this battery is a valuable addition to any household or outdoor setup. If you're looking for a dependable and long-lasting power source, I highly recommend the ExpertPower 12V 7Ah Rechargeable Sealed Lead Acid Battery. Embrace the convenience and reliability it offers, and enjoy uninterrupted power for all your electronic devices and equipment with this exceptional battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as a replacement for old one
reviews.reviewText: A cost-effective replacement for the legacy battery. This is the backup battery for my broadband/FIOS model. Dimensions are correct. It works. Lightweight? No. This is a lead/acid battery. Longevity? No idea, as it has only been installed for a couple of weeks. The last one, from the same source, lasted about two years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: Block rocker battery wouldn't stay charged. Use it for drive in, pool parties anyplace I wanted music. Other then the battery it was fine, replaced battery with this one and it's as good as new. Buy it, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't fit my Verizon appliance real well, but it is working great
reviews.reviewText: I had to "modify" the Verizon appliance to make it fit, but it appears to be working really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my second ExpertPower Battery
reviews.reviewText: This unit is so efficient that the original battery lasted so long I had to purchase the same battery as a replacement. Value and longevity makes this a must battery to consider for your replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit and works perfectly for my generator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for alarm panel
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase as battery only lasts 3-4 years before you have to replace it, works great along with great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived almost dead. I had to put it on a trickle charger overnight but it came right back up to where it needed to be.
The product was shipped quickly and was easy to install.
